name: Fastigium
description: Grab whatever you can find,kill whoever you can see. Clenching your weapon and light could help you survive in the waste subway station in Tokyo. Immerse your soul in the darkness,and good luck...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
